title: Snapshot
description: A frozen, versioned snapshot of workspace state used for auditability, diffing, and answering 'what information was before the decision-maker?'. Snapshots support forensic review without requiring deterministic model outputs.

plan_project_id.description: Snapshot anchor for Spatial Strategy mode (PlanProject).

application_id.description: Snapshot anchor for Development Management mode (Application).

run_id.description: Optional run id that produced or informed this snapshot.

state.description: Opaque, versioned state projection for the snapshot (e.g., selected tabs, authored artefact ids, key evidence refs, governance flags).

allOf.description: At least one workspace anchor must be provided (plan_project_id or application_id).
